qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Granville General Hospital and Ashland General Hospital, what were the chief complaints of patients J. Rodriguez and L. Brown?

content: Chief Complaint: Local redness, swelling, heat, and pain on the right forearm for 3 days.
High fever, chills, and headache for 3 days

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Granville General Hospital, patient J. Rodriguez's chief complaint was local redness, swelling, heat, and pain on the right forearm for 3 days. According to the hospitalization records of Ashland General Hospital, patient L. Brown's chief complaint was high fever, chills, and headache for 3 days.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Granville General Hospital and Ashland General Hospital, what were the preliminary diagnoses for patients J. Rodriguez and L. Brown?

content: Preliminary Diagnosis: Furuncle of the right forearm

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Granville General Hospital, patient J. Rodriguez's preliminary diagnosis was a furuncle of the right forearm. According to the hospitalization records of Ashland General Hospital, patient L. Brown's preliminary diagnosis was malaria.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Granville General Hospital and Ashland General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, J. Rodriguez or L. Brown?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: J. Rodriguez was admitted on February 26, and L. Brown was admitted on March 25. J. Rodriguez was admitted earlier.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Granville General Hospital and Ashland General Hospital, whose temperature was higher upon admission, J. Rodriguez or L. Brown?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: J. Rodriguez's temperature was 37째C, and L. Brown's temperature was 39째C. L. Brown's temperature was higher upon admission.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Granville General Hospital and Ashland General Hospital, whose pulse rate was higher upon admission, J. Rodriguez or L. Brown?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: J. Rodriguez's pulse rate was 90 bpm, and L. Brown's pulse rate was 110 bpm. L. Brown's pulse rate was higher upon admission.
